title: This regulation will apply to heritage sites which means, artefacts, structures, areas and precincts of historic and / or architectural and / or cultural significance (hereinafter as ‗Listed Buildings / Heritage Buildings and Listed Precincts / Heritage Precincts‘‘) and those natural features of environmental significance including scared graves, hills, hillocks, water bodies (and the areas adjoining the same) etc
clause_text: This regulation will apply to heritage sites which means, artefacts, structures, areas and precincts of historic and / or architectural and / or cultural significance (hereinafter as ‗Listed Buildings / Heritage Buildings and Listed Precincts / Heritage Precincts‘‘) and those natural features of environmental significance including scared graves, hills, hillocks, water bodies (and the areas adjoining the same) etc. within the areas of Planning Authorities and Regional Plan.
